snippet.title: Jitter - Official Video Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Jitter turns Twitch streams into fully interactive, Twitch-integrated gaming experiences — where thousands of players can jump in at the same time!

Viewers don't just watch, they play, with the ability to control the action right from Twitch chat. Whether it's joining the game directly or influencing gameplay through real-time chat commands, Jitter creates massive-scale experiences that keep everyone engaged.

With Jitter, the whole stream becomes one big, epic game!

Play for Free at: Jitter.tv 
Coming 2025...
